patient.Name: patient
patient.Description: Reference to a Patient resource the Flag is for.
patient.Optional: Either patient or subject must be specified. If both are specified, they must match.

status.Name: status
status.Description: Status of the patient FYI. If no status is specified, all FYIs are returned.

subject.Name: subject
subject.Description: Reference to a Patient resource the Flag is for.
subject.Optional: Either patient or subject must be specified. If both are specified, they must match.

Bundle.Name: Bundle
Bundle.Description: Resource bundle. For more information, refer to the FHIR specification.

Flag.Name: Flag
Flag.Description: A single instance of a Flag resource.

category.Name: category
category.Description: For patient FYIs, this is set to "patient-fyi" and LOINC code 74018-3 – Alert.

code.Name: code
code.Description: The type and content of the FYI.

coding.Name: coding
coding.Description: The type of FYI, as specified in the note record, and optionally an external mapping for that type.

period.Name: period
period.Description: The most recent period when the flag was active.  If the flag is currently active, only period.start is populated.

end.Name: end
end.Description: Date when the flag was inactivated.

start.Name: start
start.Description: Date when the flag was created/activated.

subject.Name: subject
subject.Description: The patient associated with the flag.
